021import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
022import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
023import net.tnemc.core.currency.CurrencyType;
024import net.tnemc.core.utils.Identifier;
025
026import java.math.BigDecimal;
027
028/**
029 * HoldingsHandler represents a handler that could provide additional holding types.
030 *
031 * @author creatorfromhell
032 * @see Account
033 * @see CurrencyType
034 * @see Identifier
035 * @since 0.1.2.0
036 */
037public interface HoldingsHandler {
038
039  /**
040   * The identifier for this handler.
041   *
042   * @return The identifier that represents this handler.
043   */
044  Identifier identifier();
045
046  /**
047   * Used to determine if this handler may be used for the specified{@link Currency} and {@link CurrencyType}.
048   *
049   * @param currency The currency.
050   * @param type The currency type.
051   *
052   * @return True if it supports the currency type, otherwise false.
053   */
054  boolean supports(Currency currency, CurrencyType type);
055
056  /**
057   * Used to determine if this handler may be used for the specified {@link Account}. This defaults
058   * to true for all accounts.
059   *
060   * @param currency The currency.
061   * @param account The account.
062   *
063   * @return True if it supports the account, otherwise false.
064   */
065  default boolean appliesTo(final Account account, final Currency currency) {
066
067    return true;
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * @return If balances of this handler should be saved to the database. Return false to do your
072   * own data handling.
073   */
074  default boolean database() {
075
076    return true;
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Used to set the holdings for a specific account.
081   *
082   * @param account  The account.
083   * @param region   The name of the region involved. This is usually a world, but could be
084   *                 something else such as a world guard region name/identifier.
085   * @param currency The instance of the currency to use.
086   * @param type     The currency type.
087   * @param amount   The amount to set the player's holdings to.
088   *
089   * @return True if the holdings have been set, otherwise false.
090   */
091  boolean setHoldings(Account account, String region, Currency currency, CurrencyType type, BigDecimal amount);
092
093  /**
094   * Used to get the holdings for a specific account from this handler.
095   *
096   * @param account  The Account.
097   * @param region   The name of the region involved. This is usually a world, but could be
098   *                 something else such as a world guard region name/identifier.
099   * @param currency The instance of the currency to use.
100   * @param type     The currency type.
101   *
102   * @return The holdings for the specific account.
103   */
104  HoldingsEntry getHoldings(Account account, String region, Currency currency, CurrencyType type);
105}
